name: Hentai Dreams
description:
The Raven... A wonderful place to go find food to eat and a bed to sleep in if your looking for a hentai themed B&B. But wait there is no art in this place, Whats going on?

In Hentai Dreams you are given mini games to complete by girls, each mini game that you complete you unlock some art for "The Raven".
Place art on walls or on chairs it's your decision!

The game contains unique custom drawn nude hentai characters that have been created just for "Hentai Dreams".There are currently 5 types of puzzles:
  • Card Memory Game(You must match 2 of the same tile).
  • Slide And Match Game(You must complete the image by moving around a single tile).
  • Shoot It Game(You must break all tiles before the time runs out).
  • 3D Escape Game(A 3D puzzle game in which you navigate a cube to the end).
  • Mouse Maze Game(You must navigate your mouse to the end without touching the side of the maze).
Some of our cute girls:
Meet the rest in game!

Trading cards will be available as soon as possible!
